nodeList.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
nodeList.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: {Wraiths} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but are unable to move.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wraiths cannot move, but deal 40% more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: {Wraiths} have more melee attack speed (multiplicative with other modifers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wraiths have [10%] more melee attack speed per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: Summon Wraith has a shorter cooldown, and there is a shorter delay between each {Wraith} being summoned.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
[7%] increased coolodwn recovery speed per point

[7%] reduced wraith interval per point

node.description: Summon Wraith summons three additional {Wraiths} with each cast, but Summon Wraith also costs more mana and now has a cooldown.
node.nodeDescription: Adds a 6 second cooldown and increases mana cost by 150%. You summon 4 wraiths with each cast of summon wraith, but there is a half second interval between each wraith.

node.description: {Wraiths} have more melee attack speed (multiplicative with other modifers).
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths have [10%] more melee attack speed per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: Summon Wraith summons additional {Wraiths} per cast, but costs more mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [25%] increased mana cost per point. Summons [1] additional wraith[s] per point.

node.description: Summon Wraith summons three additional {Wraiths} with each cast, but Summon Wraith also costs more mana and now has a cooldown.
node.nodeDescription: Adds a 6 second cooldown and increases mana cost by 150%. You summon 4 wraiths with each cast of summon wraith, but there is a half second interval between each wraith.

node.description: {Wraiths} have more melee attack speed (multiplicative with other modifers).
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths have [10%] more melee attack speed per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: {Wraiths} have more maximum health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wraiths have [20%] more health per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: {Wraiths} that are summoned nearby a corpse have more health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you consume a corpse with summon wraith the wraiths you summon will have [25%] more health per point (multiplicative with other bonuses)

node.description: {Wraiths} that are summoned nearby a corpse deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers). This consumes the corpse.
node.nodeDescription: If you cast summon wraith near a corpse, the corpse will be consumed and the wraith(s) you summon will deal 30% more damage (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.description: {Wraiths} have more maximum health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths have [20%] more health per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: {Wraiths} that are summoned nearby a corpse have increased attack speed, cast speed and move faster (all multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you consume a corpse with summon wraith the wraiths you summon will have [10%] more attack speed, cast speed, and movement speed per point (multiplicative with other bonuses)

node.description: {Wraiths} that are summoned nearby a corpse deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers). This consumes the corpse.
node.nodeDescription: If you cast summon wraith near a corpse, the corpse will be consumed and the wraith(s) you summon will deal 30% more damage (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.description: {Wraiths} have more maximum health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths have [20%] more health per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: When you consume a corpse with Summon Wraith you have a chance to summon a {Blood Wraith} instead.
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you consume a corpse with summon wraith you have a 20% chance to summon a blood wraith instead. Blood wraiths have more health and their health decays more slowly.

node.description: {Wraiths} that are summoned nearby a corpse have more health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: When you consume a corpse with summon wraith the wraiths you summon will have [25%] more health per point (multiplicative with other bonuses)

node.nodeDescription: Wraiths have [20%] more health per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: {Wraiths} deal additional necrotic damage with attacks and spells.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wraiths deal [4] additional necrotic damage with attacks and spells

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: Summon Wraith has increased cast speed and costs less mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [14%] increased mana efficiency per point\n\n[7%] increased cast speed per point when casting summon wraith

node.description: {Wraiths} deal additional necrotic damage with attacks and spells.
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths deal [4] additional necrotic damage with attacks and spells

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

node.description: {Wraiths} have more critical strike chance (multiplicative with other modifiers), and when you cast Summon Wraith you gain increased critical strike chance equal to its mana cost for 4 seconds.
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths have 20% more critical strike chance (multiplicative with other modifiers).\n\nWhen you cast summon wraith you gain increased critical strike equal to the mana you spend to cast summon wraith.

node.description: {Wraiths}' health decays more slowly.
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths' health drain is reduced by [12%] per point

node.altText: The health bonus is multiplicative with other modifiers.
node.description: {Wraiths} have more maximum health (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Summon Wraith costs more mana and has reduced cast speed.
node.nodeDescription: Summon wraith has [10%] increased mana cost per point, and [5%] reduced cast speed per point, but wraiths have [40%] more health per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: Removes the delay between each {Wraith} being summoned, but fewer Wraiths are summoned per cast (rounded up).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wraiths are summoned nearly instantly, but summon wraith summons 34% fewer wraiths (the number of wraiths it summons is rounded up).

node.description: Summon Wraith summons additional {Wraiths} per cast, but costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: [25%] increased mana cost per point. Summons [1] additional wraith[s] per point.

node.description: Summon Wraith summons three additional {Wraiths} with each cast, but Summon Wraith also costs more mana and now has a cooldown.
node.nodeDescription: Adds a 6 second cooldown and increases mana cost by 150%. You summon 4 wraiths with each cast of summon wraith, but there is a half second interval between each wraith.

node.description: {Wraiths} have more melee attack speed (multiplicative with other modifers).
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths have [10%] more melee attack speed per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: {Wraiths} that are summoned nearby a corpse deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers). This consumes the corpse.
nodeList.nodeDescription: If you cast summon wraith near a corpse, the corpse will be consumed and the wraith(s) you summon will deal 30% more damage (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.description: {Wraiths} have more maximum health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths have [20%] more health per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.description: {Wraiths} appear at the target location, but Summon Wraith costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 20% increased mana cost. Wraiths appear at the target location.

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: You have a chance to instead summon a {Flame Wraith}, which cast fireballs. {Wraiths} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wraiths deals [15%] increased damage per point. You have [11%] chance per point to summon a flame wraith instead of a regular wraith. Flame Wraiths throw fireballs, and their health decays more slowly.

node.description: Summon Wraith has increased cast speed and costs less mana.
node.nodeDescription: [14%] increased mana efficiency per point\n\n[7%] increased cast speed per point when casting summon wraith

node.description: {Wraiths} deal additional necrotic damage with attacks and spells.
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths deal [4] additional necrotic damage with attacks and spells

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

node.description: {Wraiths} have more critical strike chance (multiplicative with other modifiers), and when you cast Summon Wraith you gain increased critical strike chance equal to its mana cost for 4 seconds.
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths have 20% more critical strike chance (multiplicative with other modifiers).\n\nWhen you cast summon wraith you gain increased critical strike equal to the mana you spend to cast summon wraith.

node.description: {Wraiths}' health decays more slowly.
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths' health drain is reduced by [12%] per point

node.altText: The health bonus is multiplicative with other modifiers.
node.description: {Wraiths} have more maximum health (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Summon Wraith costs more mana and has reduced cast speed.
node.nodeDescription: Summon wraith has [10%] increased mana cost per point, and [5%] reduced cast speed per point, but wraiths have [40%] more health per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.

nodeList.description: You have a chance to instead summon a {Putrid Wraith}, which Poison enemies from a distance. {Wraiths} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wraiths deals [15%] increased damage per point. You have [11%] chance per point to summon a putrid wraith instead of a regular wraith. Putrid Wraiths throw poison from range, and and their health decays more slowly.

node.description: {Wraiths}' melee attacks have a chance to poison enemies.
node.nodeDescription: Wraiths have [20%] chance to poison on hit per point

node.altText: The health bonus is multiplicative with other modifiers.
node.description: {Wraiths} have more maximum health (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Summon Wraith costs more mana and has reduced cast speed.
node.nodeDescription: Summon wraith has [10%] increased mana cost per point, and [5%] reduced cast speed per point, but wraiths have [40%] more health per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.loreText: Unleash the echoes of the dead
node.nodeDescription: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains. There is no limit on the number of wraiths you can control at once.
